summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EventSnap MVP. Fixed critical backend bug and verified full AI-powered event extraction flow works end-to-end.

minor_issues.issue: Accepts invalid data and generates default calendar instead of returning 400 error
minor_issues.impact: Low - functionality works but validation could be stricter

passed_tests: Homepage loads with upload zone, upload button, and camera button
Upload button accepts image files and shows preview
Camera button is present and clickable
Extract button appears/disappears based on image presence
POST /api/extract-event successfully extracts event details using GPT-5.2 vision
POST /api/generate-ics generates valid ICS calendar files
Full flow: upload image → AI extraction → edit details → download ICS file
Event form fields populate correctly with extracted data
Users can edit extracted event details
Download ICS button works when event data is present
Error handling for missing image files
AI extraction accurately identifies title, date, time, location, and description
